title: Vidlogd
caption: Terminal YouTube Logger
description: Vidlogd is my first Go project, a CLI application for logging and managing YouTube videos. Inspired by terminal workflows (Neovim, Tmux) and the concept of 'Letterboxd for YouTube', it uses the Bubble Tea TUI framework.

The app integrates with the YouTube Data API to prefetch video details, allowing users to rate and review. It features a data view and analytics dashboard with statistics on video logs, ratings, rewatch percentages, and charts for trends and channel insights.
seoDescription: Vidlogd is a terminal-based YouTube video logger built with Go. Features include video logging, ratings, reviews, data management, and an analytics dashboard with interactive charts and channel statistics.
